Title: Establishes a special needs assisted living program to serve persons with neurodegenerative diseases
Summary: Establishes a special needs assisted living program to serve residents of certified assisted living residences with neurodegenerative diseases, such as dementia or Parkinson's disease, who are experiencing behavior disturbances.
LawCode: Amd ยง4655, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing a special needs assisted living program to serve persons with neurodegenerative diseases
